Subclass Master Raina:

Hello!
You can ask me about everything that is associated with subclasses.
What do you want from me?

With some help of the gods, leaving the same state level Division, you can change class. Change the profession of a subclass (Certificate is required to change the occupation)

New subclass created at level 40. Add subclass (recreate)

When changing a subclass level is reset to 40. Add subclass after destruction (reset)
